intro.content:
Hi {{ contact.FIRSTNAME }}, how is everything going?

On my side, things have been running quite smoothly: we are now a couple of weeks away from the baby delivery (yes I am going to be a first-time dad!) and me and my partner are finalizing the last couple of details.
Otherwise, regarding this newsletter I shot today a full walkthrough of how I create it every week. So, if you are interested in seeing how things are automated behind the scene this one is for you!

Have a great week!

hero.title: Look at this cute miniature room
hero.description: So manylittle details (the computer screen displaying super mario world choco island <3!).
hero.why:
When I saw this video it immediately reminded me of these hidden streetart blocks and the LEGO tiny houses people created on Twitter.
I found the intersection between the two simply magical âœ¨

randomArticles.title: How Seville is turning leftover oranges into electricity
randomArticles.description: Pilot scheme will use methane from fermenting fruit to create clean power for city water plant.

randomArticles.title: A desperate man entered a Bangkok police station.
Ugandan man becomes a lawyer to win family land back
randomArticles.description: Jordan Kinyera goes through 18 years of education, becomes a lawyer and wins his father's court case.

randomArticles.title: Carl Sagan's explanation of how the Ancient Greek knew Earth was Round
randomArticles.description: Flat earthers: I'll just pretend I didn't see that.

randomArticles.title: Electronics goes wrong
randomArticles.description: Some of the finest Electronics work I have ever seen.

animalCorner.title: Tiny Baby Stoat
animalCorner.description: At less than 4 weeks old, Whisper was abandoned by her mom. Fortunately, Robert cared for her around the clock.
